casebody.data:
DESMOND
v.
The NEWS & OBSERVER PUBLISHING COMPANY, et al. No. 207P15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Aug. 20, 2015. James T. Johnson, Raleigh, for Desmond, Beth. John A. Bussian, Raleigh, for The News and Observer Publishing Company, et al. Mark J. Prak, Raleigh, for N.C. Association of Broadcasters, et al. Timothy Nelson, Raleigh, for N.C. Association of Broadcasters, et al.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the conditional motion filed on the 25th of June 2015 by file NC Association of Broadcasters, NC Press Association, the Associated Press, BH Media Group, Inc., Gannett Company, Inc., Halifax Media Group, the Carolina Journal, and Time Warner Cable News for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief:

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of August 2015."
